animations.name: Fade In
animations.css: @keyframes fade-in { from { opacity: 0; } to { opacity: 1; } } .fade-in { animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out; }

animations.name: Slide In
animations.css: @keyframes slide-in { from { transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } } .slide-in { animation: slide-in 1s ease-in-out; }
